A fun game with a few downsides, a lot of cheaters, and not good communication between developers and players and alot of people have lost alot of money due to false overwatch bans by golden nova's who dont know what they are looking for. I wish they would raise the bar when it comes to overwatch cases and make it at least master guardian 2. Also i recommend playing on EU servers with a VPN in higher elo since the majority of NA is cheaters. Cultural differences I guess? Also people on EU are alot shittier so its easier to level up.

For start, this is the best tactical shooter available right now. Although the machine is not realistic, it is entertaining. The main issue is cheating; there is always at least one cheater, which ruins the game experience. In conclusion, I recommend this game to anyone who enjoys tactical shooters, but first test the free version before purchasing the prime  version.
